Control.ttp: zhThis page provides information related to Security Settings.
zhThe username used for logging into the PAC.
zhWhen checked, indicates no password is required for this user to login to the PAC.
zhThe password used for logging into the PAC.
zhThe password used for logging into the PAC. (Must match the password entered above.)
zhWhen checkmarked, indicates that this user is currently enabled.
zhDate and time this user was first added to the database.
zhDate and time of the last modifications made to this user.
zhLevel of access granted to this user.
zhClick to display online help related to this page...
zhClick to begin adding a new user...
zhClick to indicate the selected user should be removed...
zhClick to save the current user information to the database...
zhClick to refresh the contents of this page...
zhClick to collapse all the groups in the grid...
zhClick to expand all the groups in the grid...
zhThe username used for logging into the PAC
zhIndicates the level of access granted to this user.
zhThe date and time the user was added to the database.
zhThe date and time of the last modification.
zhIndicates whether the user is currently enabled or not.
zhThe date and time the user last accessed the database via the corresponding IP Address.
zhThe IP Address(es) the user accessed the database from.

Messages.Message: zhPassword must be at least {0} characters in length.
zhNew Password and Confirm Password must match.
zhUsername must be at least {0} characters in length.
